original_text: The king of Babylon will arrive at the place where the road goes in separate directions. He will try to decide which way to go. He will use magic to ask his gods to tell him. He will shake arrows in his hands. He will pray to his idols. He will look at the livers of animals. These were different kinds of magic that they used to find out what their false gods said. A liver is an inside part of an animal. 21: The king of Babylon will arrive at the place where the road goes in separate directions. He will try to decide which way to go. He will use magic to ask his gods to tell him. He will shake arrows in his hands. He will pray to his idols. He will look at the livers of animals.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕이 갈랫길 곧 두 길 어귀에 서서 점을 치되 화살들을 흔들어 우상에게 묻고 희생제물의 간을 살펴서

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon will arrive
at the place where the road goes in separate directions
He will try to decide which way to go
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어느 길로 갈지 결정하려고 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will use magic to ask his gods to tell him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마법을 사용하여 자신의 신들에게 말하게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will shake arrows in his hands
He will pray to his idols
He will look at the livers of animals
These were different kinds of magic
that they used to find out
A liver is an inside part of an animal
